item.title: EMNLP 2024 Demo Track Summary
item.description:
Tasks/Roles:

  • Before submission:
    • Call for papers of the demo track
    • Openreview set up and operations, including submission form including all the submission field (video link, demo link, etc), the review form, meta review form, decision option, camera ready form, etc
  • During Submission:
    • Hire reviewers, area chairs, chasing reviews and area chairs
    • Making the final decision (we assign chairs as SACs)
    • Composing Award Committee, voting for Best Paper Awards
  • After submission:
    • Proceedings, checking whether the format is correct and contact authors to revise, will take a long time
    • Underline coordination
    • Registration tracking & on-site demo coordination
  • Publicize about the demo track

Recommendations/Lessons learned:

  • Most importantly: We recommend to split the task at the beginning, set up timeline for each task (that is why we give a complete list of the tasks)
  • The length of the demo paper (6 pages) and main paper (8 pages) is different. Should we change it? If not, please highlight this.
  • We set Appendix page limitation, which may not be very useful, as demo tends to need more space for visualizations
  • Ask area chairs to hire emergency reviewers to ensure there are no less than 3 reviews when they write a meta review. Some area chairs do not chase reviewers.
  • Give more time for reviewers and meta reviewers

OpenReview Settings:

item.title: NAACL 2025 Publication Co-Chair Summary
item.description:
Tasks/Roles:

  • Before submission:
    • Apply for ISBN
  • During Submission:
    • Cooridnating the camera-ready date
    • Cooridnating the workshop camera-ready date
  • After submission:
    • Main / Findings Proceedings, checking whether the format is correct and contact authors to revise, will take a long time
    • Workshop proceedings
    • Industry proceedings
    • Demo proceedings
    • Tutorial proceedings, Student Mentoring Proceedings, etc
    • Handbook meta data

Proceeding list

  • Proceedings of the 2025 Conference of the Nations of the Americas Chapter of the Association for Computational Linguistics: Human Language Technologies (Volume 1: Long Papers)
  • Proceedings of the 2025 Conference of the Nations of the Americas Chapter of the Association for Computational Linguistics: Human Language Technologies (Volume 2: Short Papers)
  • Proceedings of the 2025 Conference of the Nations of the Americas Chapter of the Association for Computational Linguistics: Human Language Technologies (Volume 3: System Demonstrations)
  • Proceedings of the 2025 Conference of the Nations of the Americas Chapter of the Association for Computational Linguistics: Human Language Technologies (Volume 4: Student Research Workshop)
  • Proceedings of the 2025 Conference of the Nations of the Americas Chapter of the Association for Computational Linguistics: Human Language Technologies (Volume 5: Tutorial Abstracts)
  • Proceedings of the 2025 Conference of the Nations of the Americas Chapter of the Association for Computational Linguistics: Human Language Technologies (Volume 6: Industry Track)
  • Findings of the Association for Computational Linguistics: NAACL 2025
  • Proceeding of the First Workshop on AI and Scientific Discovery: Directions and Opportunities
  • Proceedings of the 7th Workshop on Computational Approaches to Linguistic Code-Switching
  • Proceedings of the 10th Workshop on Computational Linguistics and Clinical Psychology (CLPsych 2025)
  • Proceedings of the Workshop on Cognitive Modeling and Computational Linguistics (CMCL 2025)
  • Proceedings of the Fifth Workshop on Speech and Language Technologies for Dravidian Languages
  • Proceedings of the 4th Workshop on Knowledge-Augmentation for Language Models and NLP Methods
  • Proceedings of the Eighth Workshop on Technologies for Machine Translation of Low-Resource Languages (LoResMT 2025)
  • Proceedings of the 22nd SIGMORPHON Workshop on Computational Morphology, Phonology, and Phonetics
  • Proceedings of the Tenth Workshop on Noisy and User-generated Text (W-NUT 2025)
  • Proceedings of the 5th Workshop on Trustworthy NLP (TrustNLP 2024)
  • Proceedings of the 5th International Conference on Natural Language Processing for Digital Humanities
  • Proceedings of the 2nd Workshop on Ancient Language Processing (ALP 2025)
  • Proceedings of the Fifth Workshop on NLP for Indigenous Languages of the Americas (AmericasNLP)
  • Proceedings of the 3rd Workshop on Cross-Cultural Considerations in NLP (C3NLP 2025)
  • Proceedings of the 2nd Workshop on Patient-oriented Language Processing (CL4Health 2025)
  • Proceedings of the Fourth Workshop on Intelligent and Interactive Writing Assistants (in2writing 2025)
  • Proceedings of the Sixth Workshop on Insights from Negative Results in NLP (Insights 2025)
  • Proceedings of the Ninth Joint SIGHUM Workshop on Computational Linguistics for Cultural Heritage, Social Sciences, Humanities and Literature (LaTeCH-CLfL 2025)
  • Proceedings of the 1st Workshop on Language Models for Underserved Communities (LM4UC 2025)
  • Proceedings of the 21st Workshop on Multiword Expressions (MWE 2025)
  • Proceedings of the Queer in AI workshop
  • Proceedings of the 10th Workshop on Representation Learning for NLP (RepL4NLP-2025)
  • Proceedings of the Sixth Workshop on Privacy in Natural Language Processing
  • Proceedings of the Seventh Workshop on Narrative Understanding

Workshop Settings:
